title: Shuangsheng Wu Hun
overview: Lin Fan, who was born in a noble family in Dalin County, was originally a peerless genius who was awarded the Tianjiao Order, but his martial soul was taken away by his fianc√©e, and he became a waste. When a mysterious demon parasitized Lin Fan and reactivated his abandoned martial soul, making him a rare dual martial soul physique, Lin Fan officially embarked on the road to rise, from a small county town to the heavens and the worlds.
